channel.title: [317] Item is always kept? [Delta]
channel.description: I have 4 custom items I just added. However when a player dies w/ one of these items, they dont lose these items. and these items have a low alch value so they dont protect over anything, everything protects over them. I'm assuming the code is telling the game not to let the item be dropped or something. How can I make it when some1 dies in pvp they will lose these specific items?
